com.centurylink.mdw.email

Class TemplatedEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.email.TemplatedEmail

  • public class TemplatedEmail
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends an e-mail via JavaMail/SMTP based on a template asset. Parameterization is performed through the specified RuntimeContext.
